channel.title: [HELP ME] Setting up a webclient [HELP ME]
channel.description:
I'm trying to get a webclient set up for my private server, because I plan to try to make it big.
I have tried to follow multiple tutorials, but I'm completely lost.
[size=12pt][b]If someone would kindly help me setting up this webclient, I'm willing to pay a bit via PayPal.[/b][/size]
What I need: I need someone to give me a step by step guide to [size=10pt][b]EVERYTHING[/b][/size]. I need either someone to do it all completely for me, or just give me the step by step via MSN or Skype, or some form of instant messaging.
I need to do this ASAP, and depending on how easy it's done and fast it's done determines the pay.
MSN: omgnovak@live.com Skype: novakzz
PS: If it's done in the next 20-30 minutes, there's a bonus.
